languages.text: Сорок девятый жилой отсек пострадал из-за демонических глаз, прорезавшихся на стенах. Пылающие очи надувались подобно гнилостным болотным пузырям в самых укромных местах, а потом и на виду, вызывая у любого, кто выдержит их взгляд, головные боли и приступы самобичевания. После того, как один из офицеров срезал лоскут кожи, чтобы укрыть око кровавым веком, отсек изолировали, так как ни огонь, ни другие снаряды не могли помешать новым глазам прорастать на корабле. Лишь вырвавшись из объятий Моря Душ, корабль очистился.

traits.locale_text: Сорок девятый жилой отсек пострадал из-за демонических глаз, прорезавшихся на стенах. Пылающие очи надувались подобно гнилостным болотным пузырям в самых укромных местах, а потом и на виду, вызывая у любого, кто выдержит их взгляд, головные боли и приступы самобичевания. После того, как один из офицеров срезал лоскут кожи, чтобы укрыть око кровавым веком, отсек изолировали, так как ни огонь, ни другие снаряды не могли помешать новым глазам прорастать на корабле. Лишь вырвавшись из объятий Моря Душ, корабль очистился.

languages.text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.
languages.original_text: Сорок девятый жилой отсек пострадал из-за демонических глаз, прорезавшихся на стенах. После того, как один из офицеров срезал лоскут кожи, чтобы укрыть око кровавым веком, отсек изолировали, так как ни огонь, ни другие снаряды не могли помешать новым глазам прорастать на корабле. Лишь вырвавшись из объятий Моря Душ, корабль очистился.

traits.locale_text: Living section forty nine suffered because of demonic eyes that slithered across the walls. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, in the secluded places at first and later in plain sight, and caused everyone subject to their glare to experience headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his skin to cover an eye with a makeshift eyelid, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his skin to cover an eye with a makeshift eyelid, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

Demonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of foetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

languages.text: 一双恶魔的眼睛突然出现在了四十九号船员宿舍，开始沿着宿舍墙壁移动。那双熊熊燃烧的眼球就像恶臭沼气的气泡一样迅速膨大。起初只出现在隐蔽的地方，但随后就直接出现在人们的视线中。每个被这双眼睛注视的人都感到头痛，随后开始自残。在某个军官剥下自己的一部分皮肤，为其中一只可怕的眼球做了临时的眼睑之后，那个船舱就被隔离了。无论是火焰还是其他弹药，都无法阻止更多眼睛在船上冒出来。只有从灵魂之海的钳制中逃脱出来之后，这艘舰船才能得到净化。
languages.original_text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

languages.text: Los ojos daemónicos se habían materializado y empezaban a deslizarse por las paredes del cuartel de la tripulación cuarenta y nueve. Los orbes ardientes se hincharon como burbujas de gas fétido pantanoso, al principio solo en lugares aislados y más tarde a la vista de todos. Todos los que estaban expuestos a su resplandor empezaron a sufrir dolores de cabeza y episodios de autoflagelación. Después de que uno de los oficiales se arrancara una parte de su propia piel para crear un párpado improvisado para uno de los diabólicos orbes, la sección fue puesta en cuarentena, ya que ni el fuego ni otro tipo de munición podían impedir que brotaran más ojos en la nave. La nave solo pudo limpiarse al escapar del asfixiante abrazo del Mar de Almas.
languages.original_text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: Los ojos daemónicos se habían materializado y empezaban a deslizarse por las paredes del cuartel de la tripulación cuarenta y nueve. Los orbes ardientes se hincharon como burbujas de gas fétido pantanoso, al principio solo en lugares aislados y más tarde a la vista de todos. Todos los que estaban expuestos a su resplandor empezaron a sufrir dolores de cabeza y episodios de autoflagelación. Después de que uno de los oficiales se arrancara una parte de su propia piel para crear un párpado improvisado para uno de los diabólicos orbes, la sección fue puesta en cuarentena, ya que ni el fuego ni otro tipo de munición podían impedir que brotaran más ojos en la nave. La nave solo pudo limpiarse al escapar del asfixiante abrazo del Mar de las Almas.

languages.text: ディーモンの目が実体化して、クルー居住区49の壁をスルスルと進み始めた。燃えるオーブは嫌な臭いを放つ沼地のガス泡のように膨らみ、最初は人気のない場所だけで、その後は目立つ場所に姿を現した。その輝きを浴びた者はひとり残らず頭痛と自責の念を感じ始める。とある士官が自分の肌の一部を剥がして、悪魔のようなオーブのひとつに仮のまぶたを作ってやると、火でも弾薬でも、どんどん船に湧き出る目を止められなかったので、そのセクションは隔離された。魂の海の手中から抜け出すことでやっと、船は浄化された。
languages.original_text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: ディーモンの目が実体化して、クルー居住区49の壁をスルスルと進み始めた。燃えるオーブは嫌な臭いを放つ沼地のガス泡のように膨らみ、最初は人気のない場所だけで、その後は目立つ場所に姿を現した。その輝きを浴びた者はひとり残らず頭痛と自責の念を感じ始める。とある士官が自分の肌の一部を剥がして、悪魔のようなオーブのひとつに仮のまぶたを作ってやると、火でも弾薬でも、どんどん船に湧き出る目を止められなかったので、そのセクションは隔離された。魂の海の手中から抜け出すことでやっと、船は浄化された。

languages.text: Des yeux démoniaques se matérialisent et infiltrent les murs du quartier quarante-neuf. Les orbes incandescents se mettent à gonfler tels des bulles de gaz fétide des marais, d'abord dans des recoins isolés, puis à la vue de tous. Tous ceux qui sont soumis à leur regard souffrent de violents maux de tête et vont même jusqu'à s'autoflageller. Mais après qu'un officier s'est arraché un morceau de peau pour offrir une paupière de fortune à l'un des orbes diaboliques, la section est mise en quarantaine, car ni le feu ni les armes ne peuvent empêcher d'autres yeux de se matérialiser Ce n'est que lorsque le vaisseau échappe à la sinistre étreinte de la Mer des Âmes que le problème se dissipe de lui-même.
languages.original_text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

Tous ceux qui sont soumis à leur regard souffrent de violents maux de tête et vont même jusqu'à s'autoflageller. Mais après qu'un officier s'est arraché un morceau de peau pour offrir une paupière de fortune à l'un des orbes diaboliques, la section est mise en quarantaine, car ni le feu ni les armes ne peuvent empêcher d'autres yeux de se matérialiser Ce n'est que lorsque le vaisseau échappe à la sinistre étreinte de la Mer des Âmes que le problème se dissipe de lui-même.

languages.text: An den Wänden von Crewquartier 49 waren dämonische Augen erschienen, die sich durch die Räume bewegten. Die brennenden Kugeln schwollen an wie Blasen stinkender Sumpfgase, zunächst nur in abgelegenen Ecken und Winkeln, bald aber vor aller Augen. Jeder, der von ihren Blicken getroffen wurde, bekam schreckliche Kopfschmerzen und begann, sich selbst zu geißeln. Nachdem einer der Offiziere einen Teil seiner eigenen Haut abgezogen hatte, um daraus ein Augenlid für die bösen Kugeln zu fertigen, wurde der Abschnitt unter Quarantäne gestellt da weder Feuer noch andere Munition verhindern konnten, dass noch weitere Augen im Schiff erschienen. Geläutert wurde das Schiff erst, als es aus der engen Umklammerung des Meers der Seelen entkam.
languages.original_text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.

traits.locale_text: An den Wänden von Crewquartier 49 waren jedoch dämonische Augen erschienen, die sich durch die Räume bewegten. Die brennenden Kugeln schwollen an wie Blasen stinkender Sumpfgase, zunächst nur in abgelegenen Ecken und Winkeln, bald aber vor aller Augen. Jeder, der von ihren Blicken getroffen wurde, bekam schreckliche Kopfschmerzen und begann, sich selbst zu geißeln. Nachdem einer der Offiziere einen Teil seiner eigenen Haut abgezogen hatte, um daraus ein Augenlid für die bösen Kugeln zu fertigen, wurde der Abschnitt unter Quarantäne gestellt da weder Feuer noch andere Munition verhindern konnten, dass noch weitere Augen im Schiff erschienen. Geläutert wurde das Schiff erst, als es aus der engen Umklammerung des Meers der Seelen entkam.

languages.text: Kırk dokuzuncu mürettebat odasının duvarlarında şeytani gözler belirdi ve duvarda kıvrılarak ilerlemeye başladı. Yanan ve bataklıktaki baloncuklar gibi şişen bu göz küreleri, önce yalnızca kuytu köşelerde ortaya çıkarken sonraları herkesin görebileceği yerlere yayıldı. Gözlere maruz kalanlar, baş ağrısı çekmeye ve kendine zarar verme krizlerine girmeye başladı. Subaylardan birinin bu lanetli kürelerden birine doğaçlama bir göz kapağı yapmak için kendi derisinin bir kısmını soyması üzerine bu alan karantinaya alındı. Ne ateş ne de herhangi bir mühimmat, gemide daha fazla gözün çıkmasını önleyemedi. Geminin Ruhlar Denizi'nden kurtulması üzerine gözler kayboldu.
languages.original_text: Daemonic eyes had materialised and begun to slither across the walls of crew quarter forty-nine. The burning orbs swelled like bubbles of fetid swamp gas, only in secluded places at first, later appearing in plain sight. Everyone subject to their glare started experiencing headaches and spells of self-flagellation. After one of the officers peeled off a portion of his own skin to fashion a makeshift eyelid for one of the fiendish orbs, the section was quarantined since neither fire nor other munitions could prevent more eyes from sprouting up on the ship. The vessel was cleansed only by escaping from the clutching embrace of the Sea of Souls.
